overview: It's Leah Lee's 18th birthday and she's excited. Her two stepmoms, Cory Chase and Nadia White, are adorning the living room with decorations for the occasion. Leah then mentions something about a family tradition. It's revealed that Nadia's family has a tradition that includes having sex with stepdaughters when they turn 18, so the stepdaughters will feel empowered and ready to face the world.
title: Girl's All Grown Up
